paragraphs.body: Blinding Edge Pictures is a film production company owned by ${link_0}. The company is based in Berwyn, Pennsylvania, on the Main Line. It has produced The Happening, Lady in the Water, The Village, Signs, Unbreakable, and ${link_1}.
paragraphs.text: Blinding Edge Pictures is a film production company owned by M. Night Shyamalan. The company is based in Berwyn, Pennsylvania, on the Main Line. It has produced The Happening, Lady in the Water, The Village, Signs, Unbreakable, and The Last Airbender.
